name: Zombie Killer (ZGZCG)
description:
Defend your supply and kill Zs

The world is full of  Zombies out there. You are a soldier whose mission is to kill zombies.  Be careful to protect your supplies and survive as long as you can. Grab your guns and kick their asses!

Three scenes and five weapons

Recommended Specs (1080p)

  • GTX 780
  • i5-2500K
  • 4 GB of RAM
  • 75 MB available space

This game is made by free assets , so it's completely free. I am open to more suggestions and comments. If you like the game, enjoy it and buy me a coffee if you want. Otherwise,  enjoy some other stuff in your life. Life is fantastic:)
